website_summaries.verdict: Nothing fancy here -- just a trash can that opens with a foot pedal and will last forever. It is quite small, however.
pros: A small, durable trash can that is affordable and will last the rest of your life
can use plastic grocery sacks as liners
cons: This is good for bathrooms and small spaces, but you can't put much in it

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this product! It rusts!
customer_reviews.text: The stainless steel rusted in less than a month in my guest bathroom! Do not buy this product for the bathroom. I spent way too much money and am unable to return this as it's past my return window! I wish I could give a 0 star
customer_reviews.author: Aishwarya Devaraj

customer_reviews.title: Okay for it's basic use.
customer_reviews.text: I like the features of this such as the slow-close lid, the pedal step and it takes very little space in the bathroom. The product is great, but it arrived dented. My favorite part is the slow-close lid, but it had two dents on the top and it's very visible. Please ensure that packaging is sufficient for transport. Overall, it's a good trash can but I wouldn't buy it again. It does it's job.
customer_reviews.author: SM_SF

customer_reviews.title: Just like everyone else
customer_reviews.text: Just like everyone else, it came very dented even though the box was in perfect condition. Disappointing since it fit a small space so well
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fits well by my toilet. It even came with some nice bags.
customer_reviews.author: cecily carter

customer_reviews.title: Great trash cans!
customer_reviews.text: We love the simple human cans. We have them in every bathroom, laundry room, kitchen, and a little one for the toddlers to use. My only gripe is that those perfectly sized refill bags that only fit simple human cabs are pretty pricey... They really do fit well and if you like to keep things clean and tidy then they might be worth it. Unfortunately we have to stock 3 different sized bags. For the kitchen can we don’t use the simple human bags because we go through way to many... We just use the Kirkland brand kitchen bags and they still tuck in nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Not Assigned

customer_reviews.title: Works well for cat litter, does absorb odors
customer_reviews.text: Grocery store shopping bags do fit this trash can, but not quite as well as the expensive bags simplehuman sells specifically to fit this model. I use it for cat litter, and the plastic lid and plastic bucket have absorbed some gnarly odors that are apparent even after washing the inside. With the lid closed it does not smell. For our one small cat, it holds a week of waste and litter, including a full change of the box. It does not have a soft-close hinge damper, but I'm not sure it needs one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Decent looking trash can
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this trash can in my kitchen for a few months and have no complaints. It has a good weight to it; it doesn’t fly up in the air when you push the pedal like a lighter one would. The pedal has a nice action and the lid doesn’t slam shut. It’s the perfect size for putting the bags down the trash chute, if that applies to you. I try not to put food waste in it, so can’t really speak for how well it contains smells. I still haven’t found the right alternative bags for this though – the branded bags included are great, but I consider them too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Lex R.

customer_reviews.title: Great bathroom or office trash cans
customer_reviews.text: These are great bathroom trash cans or office trash cans. I purchased two of them and they fit great in my bathrooms. The lid opens and closes quietly. It has an inner basket to put the bag (this bucket is removable). This came with trash bags but I plan on buying regular garbage bags to put in them which from what I can tell they should fit just fine. It’s fits great between the toilet and the cabinets. —— I will add photos when I get A chance——
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bathrooms, but caveat emptor
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect bathroom trashcan if you don’t live in South Florida, or maybe if you don’t live in our place. We don’t have a roach problem — except for the tiny ones that find the teeny crevices in the bottom of this a wildly desirable habitat. It’s such a great item that we’ve kept it for 4 years, despite its occasional insect occupants. I’ve even come to see them as rather adorable, which has got to be a testament to the trashcan’s sturdy, ergonomic appeal, because they just aren’t.
customer_reviews.author: J. Patton

customer_reviews.title: Actually Worth the Cost
customer_reviews.text: I don't often opt for brand-name products, but reading reviews, I see that other products are often dented, the pedal-lid lift doesn't last, etc. I paid $39 for this can to keep our Corgi from using the bathroom trash as a treasure chest, and it does that very well. It's narrow and a bit taller than our last can, so it fits in the small space next to the sink, but still holds quite a bit. Good job, simplehuman.
customer_reviews.author: Fireflyfaster

customer_reviews.title: Cheap components. Rich look on the outside, poor quality on the inside
customer_reviews.text: I have had this trash can for approximately 1 year. Started to clean it today and I noticed that rust is forming on the metal plate on the bottom of the foot pedal. The metal plate on the bottom of the foot plate doesn’t sell trash cans, the shiny Stainless Steel finger proof finish sells trash cans. Expect inferior quality on components that are non-essential to the marketing campaign so the company can save 3 cents per unit. I thought the real money was in repeat trash bag sales anyway?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for litter box duties
customer_reviews.text: I really love this little trash can. I’m using it in the cat room where there’s often stinky trash from canned food and litter box nuggets. It’s bigger than my old one so when I go scooping all our boxes I just remove this from the bin and take the inside portion with me around to scoop them all. Holds much more than my other standard bathroom trash can I was using. The only improvement I would wish for would be a little handle on the inside bin.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great trashcan dog can’t get in
customer_reviews.text: Great trashcan dog can’t get in it. We have a puppy that is obsessed with our bathroom trashcan for a while we dealt with it but after using this for one day the dog makes her :-( and hasn’t figured out how to open it the only thing I would suggest is if you have a houndini like we do put the pedal towards the back
customer_reviews.author: KC Wonder Woman

customer_reviews.title: Simplehuman does it again!
customer_reviews.text: As we’ve come to expect, Simplehuman has made another quality product. Bought a few of these and use them in the bathrooms. You can use a plastic grocery bag, but the simplehuman bags for these cans are fantastic and you can change them less often. It doesn’t take up much room and the top of the lid is black (not stainless which drove me nuts with water spots in my sons bathroom. Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.author: Monica B

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely in a small space
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the master bath and I will be buying another for the guest bath soon. It fits nicely in a tight space and the dog can't find her way in to any mischievous trouble with this one. Some reviewers were concerned about the right garbage bags to use and some folks recommending a particular bag to purchase for this can. We are using plastic grocery bags and they work just fine. I'm not so particular about the garbage bag showing. I mean, it's a garbage can, right? I also didn't see any need to spend more for a stainless steel looking lid either. Great purchase, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: T Free

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprint free - a darn lie
customer_reviews.text: As soon as we took it out of the box it was smudged with our fingerprints. We have a large Simple Human trashcan in our kitchen that actually remains smudge free, and it gets way more traffic the stainless steal is pristine. We bought this at a big box store, its packaging was different than this one, which leads me to believe it may be a fake. Either way it still looks good and as long as we wipe it down and never touch it again... all should be well.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Bolanos

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy well made garbage
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a very good quality garbage can. It is a little pricey but worth it because some of the cheaper ones are not as sturdy. It came with a few of the perfect sized bags as an extra on the inside. I can’t vouch for whether or not it is durable yet because I just received it. I had been in my daughters bathroom for over a month and is working very well. I think it is worth the money by the looks of its construction.
customer_reviews.author: NikiTX

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my dog out of the trash
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for a bathroom. It's on the small size, but I only empty it ever week or so. It hold enough small items to come in really handy. Most importantly, it keeps my stupid dog out of my trash. After years of fussing with my mutt pulling floss, ear swabs, toilet paper and everything else out and dragging it all over the house, I finally wised up and got two of these; one for each bathroom. I did get one trash can that was dented up pretty badly, but Amazon replaced it straight away with a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Bertram

customer_reviews.title: Use this under my desk in the office
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a trash can that is compact, but study. I have this under my desk in my office at home and it's exactly what we need. I tend to prop my feet up on this a lot and it holds very well. If you plan to do this as well, just keep your feet around the edges as if you put it directly in the middle it will concave in. Not made for weight on the lid, clearly but it still holds me up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: KingCuda13

customer_reviews.title: Not simplehuman brand - it's a knock-off
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, but was wondering why a screw in the lid was rusting, the top was tarnished, and the quality didn't seem up to par. When it was time to order bags for it, I found nothing on it to indicate that it was actually made by simplehuman, which alway indicated their bag size. This is a knock-off. I am disappointed. However since it says '10-year warranty' I will see if someone will honor a request for a replacement barely over 1 year after purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Great little recycle bin for the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a little recycle bin in the kitchen. Seems sturdy. Love the stainless finish. Bought the black lid model to match our kitchen trash can. -1 star as there was a small scratch on the plastic (can't buff out plastic!)
customer_reviews.author: Organization Freak / Hobby Cook

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, takes up very little floor space, but a bit short for ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a trash can that was large enough to hold ordinary plastic shopping bags because so much of our trash is now being placed into a humongous recycle bin, and we no longer needed to use the 30-gallon bags to hold our kitchen trash (mostly food items.) So the large garbage can is gone, and we've used this new can for two days. It's the right capacity for us, but it sits very low to the floor, and is a bit inconvenient to open and fill it throughout the day. My husband and I will just have to get used to stepping on its foot lever every time it has to be opened. No big deal.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie brooklyn girl

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as our "cat litter trash can" because of the other reviews I read that said it would hold about 3 bags worth of cat litter (which is true) and couldn't be happier. It even comes with a sample pack of Simple Human bags that fit this trash can perfectly! It is the perfect size to fit in a small area and the lid keeps the litter odors from escaping the trash can. FYI - I bought the one with the black plastic top and it doesn't stay open when trying to change the bag, like what other reviews mention.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Love this little trash can, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny, I've never been so elated about a trash can as I was when this arrived. It keeps odors in pretty well too, but you may need to put something heavy on the lid to keep it held down extra tight for strong odors. Would be nice if this featured a lid that closed slowly, but the price was good. TIPS: -You can pull the inner can up slightly to keep the lid open when doing some frequent trashing. -Side hooks on the inner part can hold grocery bag handles for recycling bags.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: don't buy
customer_reviews.text: lid didn't fit,it was lopsided. when you opened the lid it banged shut,not the soft close that I thought it was. DO NOT BUY! the one with the stainless steel lid is the soft close one. buy that one.I sent this one back and bought the stainless steel one.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Dog proof
customer_reviews.text: We have the large version for our kitchen and it has worked wonders for keeping our greyhound out of the trash. Very easy to clean and matches our stainless steel appliances nicely. After a few issues with our dog getting into the bathroom trash can, we caved and purchased the small size for our bathroom. These are a bit pricier than some other alternatives with lids, but our dog was able to figure out how to get into the others. Worth the extra cost and see these lasting for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Djj2018

customer_reviews.title: Diaper bin win!
customer_reviews.text: We cloth diaper but still use wipes and the occasional disposable diaper, so we didn’t need a big diaper pail since we want our cloth diapers to air dry. We ended up putting one of those baking soda refrigerator packs at the bottom because the plastic was soaking up the smell, but it smell never leaked out! We only noticed it when we opened it. Such a good investment!
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: There was a dent in the can
customer_reviews.text: well - it operates well and seems to be nice, but there was a dent in the lower side of the trash can. The box wasn't dented, so must have been packed damaged. I decided to keep it because it is for a basement bathroom and will be rarely used. But still - would have been nice to have received something more presentable.
customer_reviews.author: sslafter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Small Spaces!
customer_reviews.text: This can is the PERFECT size to place under my shampoo chair in my studio suite. It is easy to keep clean on the exterior, and also holds a decent amount of hair salon trash (ie foils, gloves, packaging) so I don't need to empty it on a daily basis. I love the sleek design and the foot pedal for opening!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Quality product - love the bags that fit it
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly next to the toilet, smooth lid motion with soft close, and the removable inner bucket makes emptying it a breeze. But my favorite feature is by far the bags made to fit the can. A sample pack comes with the can, and I won't go back to regular trash bags now. They are pricier, yes, but I've found because of the excellent fit I don't have to change them as often and they last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Imaseeker

customer_reviews.title: nice small can
customer_reviews.text: works good, build is solid. foot pedal works. It is not big, it is for a small space. It uses ordinary shopping bags from the grocery store, which is why i like it - wanted to use up my plastic shopping bags and i have a small space. Design is good, the bags go on and off very logically.
customer_reviews.author: Machi

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Litter Collector
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the 2.6 gallon container with R trash bags for 4 months now. No rust, sharp edges or odors with the device and trash bags. I clean 5 litter boxes daily for 5 cats and it takes 2 -3 days to fill up receptacle disposable bag. I keep a cloth dryer softener sheet inside to reduce any odor possibility. A+ products
customer_reviews.author: Bonehead Mechanic

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice, high quality, durable. I've used this for several years and it's still in good shape. Lid shuts tightly so no smells get out unless you open it. Recommend this brand, I use a smaller version of this for dog poop as well and it locks in odors.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Nixon

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these cans, because I loved the look, size, and shape of this trashcan. That is...until I discovered how smelly this trash can gets. It MAGNIFIES ODOR! Why hasn't anyone else emphasized this problem? The odor would not wash away. It binds to the can somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Reloving shopping

customer_reviews.title: Good product, mine were dented and dinged.
customer_reviews.text: Good product, they work well, would have gave the cans 5 stars but, they were delivered with some dents and dings in them. I was able to pop the big dent out of one, but not the dings. I didn't return them because I think it might be a pain in the butt?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little trash can
customer_reviews.text: This rectangle can is great. Fits in places between than the round onethat it replaced
customer_reviews.author: Karen D. Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bathroom Fit
customer_reviews.text: Arrived onetime and well packaged (surrounded by styrofoam type packaging), Lightweight and fits nicely between the toilet and the wall. Inside were a few of the liners suggested for this can. I didn't think the extra price would be worth the name brand of the trash can but they fit so securely I will be purchasing more liners! The can opens quickly and closes slowly so that there is no banging. There is plenty of room for my foot to press the pedal even though the can fits tightly into the space I have it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Norman

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can
customer_reviews.text: This trash can fits perfectly in the narrow space between my fridge and my counter, it holds grocery store bags well, and provides just enough room for a single person's kitchen trash. I especially love the hooks on each end, which are perfectly designed to fit the handles of my grocery bags. I think it would be too small for more than one person, but it works great for me. I also like that the stainless steel doesn't smudge easily, so it still looks great after using it for a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Ela

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: We use this trash can as a diaper pail along with scented doggie bags to put the poop diapers in. It holds about 10 soiled, size 5 diapers. It works great and way more stylish and easy to use than the conventional diaper pails. The only downfall, is the lid is very easy to open. I guess I was hoping for a lid that didn't open unless you stepped on the pedal. My dog likes to eat diapers so we have to keep this on top of the dresser. For the price, this was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kimzo

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can
customer_reviews.text: This one is so much better than the black top one. The auto close lid is so worth the extra ten bucks. I bought both for my boys rooms, and wish I had purchased two of the auto close. Love that I can use plastic bags from the grocery store to line the cans, no problem. I spray them out with Lysol spray at least a couple times a week.
customer_reviews.author: alamanna

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design for narrow spaces
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the can. It came with some trash bags that are specifically designed for the can, so I’m curious down the road how other trash bags will work. We have it in our master and while we don’t need a narrow trash can, we like the look and that it doesn’t look cluttered.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Wichmann

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well design trash can. The lid opens with the peddle smoothly, the inner plastic liner comes out easy to install the plastic bags. I have now bought two of this model and a smaller model for the bathroom. I strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C. Clough

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little trash can!
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this under the sink in the kitchen to help control stinky trash odors and it works really well! It's small but that just means the trash gets taken out more often and reduces odors even more. I love that it's hands free.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisT

customer_reviews.title: This trash does look good. But
customer_reviews.text: This trash does look good. But, after two weeks of usage, the self-closing mechanism developed a creeping squeal noise. Every time it closes, the noise would appear. So annoying to me, that I had to get rid of it. I will buy the one where it just closes by gravity.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Probably don’t blow big bucks on a trash can that will rust
customer_reviews.text: It works fine mechanically. But seriously, got rusty in a year. Weak. It was sat near the shower, but didn’t get any moisture on it directly and still has pinpoint rust spots.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn't really understand why a small garbage bin was so expensive. But when I received it, I saw that it was really quite well made. I think it'll be very durable. The foot pedal even feels nice to step on. They also included a few garbage bags to get you started, which I thought was a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: they should do better
customer_reviews.text: The garbage pail itself is well made. A bit small; that is my problem for not better visualizing the dimensions. My problem with this order is the large pack of thick plastic garbage bags they sent with it, as a come-on to order more from them. We only use biodegradable plastic here, being upset by the pollution in our oceans and lands. Now I have a plastic bag full of more plastic bags, and I can't even throw them out because that is the same mess in our environment as using them. The manufacturer of a quality product should know much better.
customer_reviews.author: GMS

customer_reviews.title: and this one work beautifully. It's simple
customer_reviews.text: Want to get a trashcan that will fit into a very tight space in my bathroom, and this one work beautifully. It's simple, it's functional, it's well built. I just use those regular plastic bag I get from grocery shopping. Love the fact that there is a removable inner bin. I take the inner bin out, hook the plastic bag's handles around the two hooks on the side (the bag's secure and won't shift position), and put the inner bin back into the trashcan. You can see just a little bit of the plastic bag from the outside; it's not noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can.
customer_reviews.text: I love this trash can. It came with a package of plastic bags that just fit right in and I don't really have to change the bag each time but just empty it out when it gets full. Also, you don't have to step on the foot pedal to open it if you are sitting. Just open the lid with your hand and throw in whatever you want. The last one I had was almost impossible to open without stepping on the foot pedal. It also looks very nice and just fits in my small space beside the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Metal Lady

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice BUT...
customer_reviews.text: It is NOT worth the price for such a small trash can. It is SOOOO Small. I had to return it and spend 30 more dollars on a 13 gallon stainless steel trash can which is definitely worth the price! If you want, I'll send you the link of the 13 gallon trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Generation_Z

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bathroom
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our bathroom. It's pretty sturdy (but it can wobble if you step on it at a weird angle). Holds a lot of trash as well. Keeps the cat from knocking it down and digging in it. Not completely fingerprint free, but easy to wipe off.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Size of a grocery bag
customer_reviews.text: I like that these garbage cans are designed to use grocery bags as liners. It's a great way to re-use your plastic grocery bags and it means the garbage can is the perfect size for most rooms and uses. We have one of these trash cans in each bathroom and just got one for our travel trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Lelan B.

customer_reviews.title: simplehuman 10 Liter / 2.6 Gallon Stainless Steel Bathroom Slim Profile Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: I like this trash can. It's fingerprint resistant stainless steel. The lid is soft close so it doesn't slam. I have a bigger version of this in my kitchen I have it for years now and it's still working good.
customer_reviews.author: GTHenderson

customer_reviews.title: Good trashcan
customer_reviews.text: First I purchased the smaller round can. This was not as nice and I decided too small for my use. Returned it and opted for the slightly bigger rectangular can. This has a nice plastic liner piece like the bigger cans and the step lid works well enough. I also have a bigger kitchen size simple human can which I am very happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This trashcan looks super sleek and high-quality. It fits about twice the amount of trash as my previous bin, so I'm not needing to change as often. I have a fairly small bathroom, and this fits really nicely along the wall. I own two simplehuman trash cans and I'm always happy with the quality of their products. Absolutely worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for cheap 4 gallon bags you can buy at the grocery store.
customer_reviews.text: I spent a long time researching trash cans on Amazon before settling on this one. My primary criteria is that the can fit cheap 4 gallon trash bags that I can find in the garbage bag aisle of the grocery store rather than requiring special liners. I can confirm that it is indeed true. They fit great, not too tight. The can is attractive, and it appears to be well-made. I only wish that it was a bit heavier, as when I stomp on the lever (I'm not gentle with things), the can is able to jostle around a bit. Highly recommended, and I'm pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Baker

customer_reviews.title: rust spots
customer_reviews.text: loved this when I first got it, but only about 2 months later it is starting to get rust stains on it. Not happy with finish. It is nice that it fits plastic bags from grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Great little trash can
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is the perfect size - I bought it for storing compost materials in the kitchen. It hides the smell well and the step to open is very easy to use. A few reviews said it was delivered dented, but mine did not - it was fine and brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Size like this is good idea for home kitchen. 1. better not keep a lot of food trash in your kitchen, there will be bugs.... 2. it can use regular plastic shopping bag, if you don't have real trash bag. In the mean times, it look nice and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for small and narrow spaces
customer_reviews.text: I chose this style of trash can for our small bathroom because it is narrow and fits into a small space. We switched to step trash cans to keep our dog out of the wastebaskets. This seals tightly and holds much more than I expected. The only thing missing is a holder for air freshener, but I stuck one underneath the lid. I use the bags suggested with this although grocery bags would work too. I'm happy with my choice, and I know this trash can will hold up for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: M. Heeren

customer_reviews.title: perfect size trashcan with lid
customer_reviews.text: had to get a trashcan with a lid for my office, this fits in the footwell of my desk, looks classic, works perfect, just the right size. love it ! would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Shaman

customer_reviews.title: Cost is high but well worth it
customer_reviews.text: We own three of these and really like them. Well built. Close softly. You can use grocery bags or there are some bags that do fit perfectly to the bucket. They look real nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lowell P.

customer_reviews.title: Works as a diaper pail
customer_reviews.text: We use this for diapers. Smell does escape when the lid is opened, but stays contained when closed. The bags are high quality and not too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for about a month now and I absolutely love it! It came with trash bags that are designed for the trash can as well! Great company and a lot of information was provided. I love that.
customer_reviews.author: LesBarb

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can for a bathroom!!!
customer_reviews.text: Streamline to fit in a small area in your bathroom. Foot pedal is large enough to open easily and love the hard plastic liner and it came with garbage bags that for perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: P & M G.

customer_reviews.title: Good can
customer_reviews.text: Good size, width bbn it was a little bigger. Fits better then our last round can, and it closes and opens without a metal bang, which was a huge seller for me
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product for any small space where you want concealed trash disposal
customer_reviews.text: Excellent small trash container. Product specific bags ridiculously expensive, but standard grocery store plastic bags are a perfect fit. I use at between bedside and nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: AnitaJohn

customer_reviews.title: withstands toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this trash can for the bathroom 4 years ago, and it is still as good as new. This despite the fact that my children use it as a stool beside the sink. It is the perfect size to use plastic grocery bags with.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great garbage can
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use as diaper pail. Love it. Bought a second for second child since first by then in regular use in bathroom. Love that it fits plastic grocery bags perfectly. Lid soft close is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can with pedal. Nice size too
customer_reviews.text: Love this little trash can but the top does get dusty and spotted since it’s metal. I just clean it off but I love having the lid so the dog doesn’t get in the trash. I need to get another one for my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived dented, they replaced it in less than 48 hours! Didn't charge me, took me at my word that I will return dented one within a month!!! Great under the kitchen sink can! Holds a grocery bag so no more buying garbage bags!
customer_reviews.author: KMK

customer_reviews.title: keeps smells contained.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to collect spent kitty litter until garbage day. You can use regular plastic grocery bags with it instead of expensive liners, and the basket's profile hold them in place. It also contains any scent from the spent litter.
customer_reviews.author: JoyD

customer_reviews.title: Cat hates it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Trashcan works great at keeping my curious cat from getting into and spilling the contents. She might be a little special cuz she loves to lick plastic bags, but with sinplehuman she leaves the bathroom trash alone.
customer_reviews.author: SmileFreshman

customer_reviews.title: One sexy trashcan.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little trash can! I have it in my bathroom and it's a huge step up in style and function from the one I used to have. The only reason I am not rating this a 5-star product is that it came with a small dent on the lid.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Love this design
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this design. Got one for each bathroom as the narrow width fit between the commode and the wall just right. They make my bath area look clean and bright. I also got the stainless toilet bowl brush with drip catcher. The two are a matched pair! Also, I am very happy with the hydraulic-type closing lid. It closes slowly but completely. I would recommend these to anyone. Came in perfect condition as well.
customer_reviews.author: IceyS

customer_reviews.title: Dog can open lid
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 other simplehuman trash cans and I love them. I purchases this one for a bathroom- to keep my dog out of the trash. Unfortunately, the dog can easily open the lid of this can.
customer_reviews.author: brenda peralo

customer_reviews.title: Two words: IT FITS!
customer_reviews.text: Raise your hand if WongFu's "How I Became An Adult" video introduced you to simplehuman. I would like to believe I am the personification of a simplehuman trashcan. This product is WELL worth your money. And the really cool thing is that it came with some free custom fit bags!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Feng

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We have five of these in three different sizes. Three for bathrooms, one for a bedroom and a double recycle/trash for the kitchen. They work well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go next to my cat litter boxes when I scoop the litter. Works perfectly and stay closed and hides any odor
customer_reviews.author: Gracie B

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great trash can... This is my 2nd one. The bags aren't that expensive if you can find a good deal. These are nice clean trash cans
customer_reviews.author: Kalzy07

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously a life saver for me. I kept getting super annoyed how quickly my bathroom trash filled up and this is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very nice trash can!
customer_reviews.text: This little trash can does what it claims: fits into the tight space between the toilet and wall, operates perfectly and quietly, and looks good. So nice to have an easy-to-use trash receptacle in the bathroom that is covered. The stainless steel is very nice and does not show fingerprints. A definite good addition to our master bath.
customer_reviews.author: HappilyRetired

customer_reviews.title: Great Roomy Garbage Can for Small Spaces
customer_reviews.text: Simple Human makes great garbage cans and this one is no different. I would like to see then weight the bottom of this type of can so the it stays put better when you step on the pedal to lift the lid. It works fine it just could be better. Get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jett Black

customer_reviews.title: Very nice-- but know it is pretty small.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a metal trashcan for my art studio, a place where I could put painting rags and not worry too much about a fire. ( Not to worry. I DO try to remove rags daily, but just to in case i forgot one time....)This trash can is fine, though I must say I was surprised how small it was. Should have read the description better. Wish now I had gone for something a bit larger. Still, it's is a good product. Just smaller than I expected. May be perfect for you if limited space is a consideration
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Nice trashcan but came with a dent
customer_reviews.text: The trashcan is nice, but it came with a big dent in the side. I can put it next to a wall, but would have expected better for the high price of this item.
customer_reviews.author: Philly mom

customer_reviews.title: trash can
customer_reviews.text: This keeps my dogs out of the garbage because they haven't figured out how to open the top whereas it fits flush.
customer_reviews.author: KCM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome as other simplehuman products
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this trash can to be our bathroom trash can and our diaper pail. We did not start the diaper pail part of the job (I'm still expecting!), but the trash can fits perfectly in our small bathroom, closes very well and doesn't let odors out (I tried it with a smelly old sponge!), and the handles on the internal bin to use with supermarket plastic bags are a great plus. Thanks for all other reviews pointing how good the bin was as a diaper pail! It is a much better investment, which will last past the baby!
customer_reviews.author: Dr_Mom

customer_reviews.title: Keeps orders contained if used for bathroom functions.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and keeps odor from escaping. Really appreciate the correct size plastic trash bags that are recommended. Comes with a few samples. But are tagged before purchase so you don’t have to shop around. Also liners can be on auto reorder. Great feature.
customer_reviews.author: aliasje

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t purchase again from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, but over-priced in my opinion. I tend to believe it’s either a counterfeit or a flaw in the design. The bags (type R) for are too small to fit securely and product arrived in a plain generic brown box.
customer_reviews.author: Melclem

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for use as a composter, perhaps will become human someday
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good bin. The lid does not slam closed. We named ours George and use it for compost. He doesn’t talk much but someday we hope George will transform into a house robot and do all the chores for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Robinson Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: It may be a bit large for a bathroom, so I'd measure first. We use it in our mudroom for receipts and it's a lot classier than a regular trash can. Plus our cat doesn't eat the receipts anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Angie STL

customer_reviews.title: Useful, good looking waste can
customer_reviews.text: Nice little garbage can for the kitchen. You can easily line this can with the ten cent plastic grocery bags sold in California grocery stores. This is inexpensive and doesn’t take up much room. Its silver and black color scheme looks good anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Svimburg

customer_reviews.title: Great little trashcan
customer_reviews.text: Great little trashcan. It’s smaller than the one I currently had, but holds just as much trash as that one. My old one was a step cab as well but it was always so hard to get the bag on fit nicely in the can. This one is much easier and simple
customer_reviews.author: t.martin

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: I can easily step on the pedal and deposit something into it. It fits easily between the toilet and the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Shelty

customer_reviews.title: I love the trash can
customer_reviews.text: I love the trash can. Make sure to order different bags. The sample bags that come with it are too snug to fit the insert. I bought the 60 piece 4 gallon trash bags when I purchased the can and will use plastic grocery bags when those are gone.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy B.

customer_reviews.title: Small Step Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: For the most part this product does what I was purchasing it to do--and serves as an under-desk trash can in my office. It is a bit smaller than I envisioned (not their fault--the description was apt), and somewhat disappointing therefore as to capacity. However, the step/lid opening feature works well--and it definitely clears without hitting the underside of the desk, so having to empty it a bit more frequently is not too big an inconvenience. Appearance is sleek & professional--which is what I was going for. May be a bit pricey for the size--but the quality is Simplehuman--& I can't quibble with that. Delivery time was as quoted. Satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Solid Good Looking Garbage Can
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these to go in our nursery (for dirty diapers). Works well for diaper pail, where the smaller size is pretty perfect for how long you want diapers hanging around. Pros: - Ease of operation - Use of plastic grocery sacks as liners - Looks good - Much cheaper on Amazon than local retailers Cons: - Little on the small side, but it is the size it advertises to be.
customer_reviews.author: KWalker

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the dogs out of the trash and fits nicely between the toilet and the vanity
customer_reviews.text: As expected! I purchased a year or so ago for a hall bath and bought a second for the master bath. Keeps the dogs out of the trash and fits nicely between the toilet and the vanity.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Love this trash can
customer_reviews.text: Love this trash can...size fits perfectly between toilet and counter sink...wish I could control easier, on how much the lid opens when stepping on foot pedal...don't like to see what is in the bathroom trash can when opened up all the way...overall, for the price, quality, very good value.
customer_reviews.author: H. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Dented lid.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a big dent in lid. I managed to pop it out somewhat but lid is creased. We needed it right away so did not return. Lousy quality control. Packaging was fine. Must have been packaged with the dent. Too expensive for that. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Wedler

product_meta.title: simplehuman 10 Liter / 2.6 Gallon Stainless Steel Bathroom Slim Profile Trash Can, Brushed Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
Color:White| Style Name:Trash can onlyThe simplehuman profile step can has a slim profile shape that makes it a great fit in a bathroom or under a desk. It has a durable steel pedal that is designed to last, and our patented lid shox technology ensures a smooth, silent close every time. Although it has a removable inner bucket that is grocery bag compatible, our code R custom fit liner fits this can perfectly — no bunching or slipping for a cleaner trash experience.

BRAND STORY
We design tools that help people become more efficient at home.

Day to day life has room for improvement. That's the basic thinking behind simplehuman. Many activities in our daily routine are so basic that we take them for granted. Washing our hands, cleaning up after a meal, grooming and prepping our appearance. Through innovation and new technologies, we find ways to streamline these simple tasks. We call our products tools for efficient living.
feature_bullets: 10-YEAR WARRANTY - We use the best materials and solid engineering so our products will last in tough environments like your home — for years.
CODE R CUSTOM FIT LINERS – Enhance your trash experience with extra-strong and durable trash bags that fit this can perfectly for a cleaner trash experience.
PERFECT FOR SMALL SPACES - Fits well in bathrooms or under desks or wherever space is limited.
STRONG PEDAL - Engineered for a smooth and easy step – gives stable operation for a "big can feel."
SILENT CLOSE LID - Patented lid shox technology controls the motion of the lid for a slow, silent, quiet close – no banging or loud noises.
REMOVABLE INNER BUCKET - Lifts out for easy trash disposal.
FINGERPRINT-PROOF FINISH - Resists smudges to keep stainless steel shiny.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,595 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
